results.deck: The 2008 iteration of Sony's NBA series.
results.name: NBA '08

results.deck: FreeStyleGames' DJ Hero uses a turntable controller to bring Guitar Hero-like gameplay to more genres and styles of music.
results.name: DJ Hero

results.deck: AC/DC Live is a standalone expansion for the Rock Band platform. It features 18 of the classic rock band's most popular songs, recorded live during concert. New 360 and PS3 versions contain a code that allows the songs to be imported into other Rock Band titles as DLC.
results.name: AC/DC Live: Rock Band

results.deck: Action video game hero Matt Hazard returns (for the first time) in this comedic video-game-themed third-person shooter for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Eat Lead: The Return of Matt Hazard

results.deck: A further iteration in the SingStar franchise for both PlayStation 2 and 3, dedicated solely to Swedish pop supergroup, ABBA.
results.name: SingStar ABBA

results.deck: Presumably cancelled, Scratch: The Ultimate DJ was a game played using a turntable controller, the "Scratch Deck," designed by Numark, which promised to "allow players to re-imagine songs on the fly and add their own creativity."
results.name: Scratch: The Ultimate DJ

results.deck: Take on a living alien tower that shifts and mutates around you, and the hordes of hostile creatures that dwell within, in this infamous Japanese clone of Gears of War.
results.name: Quantum Theory

results.deck: Kenzan is an off-shoot of Sega's Yakuza series that is set in feudal Japan.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Kenzan!

results.deck: Demon's Souls is an action-RPG developed by From Software and released in 2009. It quickly became popular within hardcore circles for its relentlessly steep difficulty level, deep combat system, and unique multiplayer integration.
results.name: Demon's Souls

results.deck: This Sony-developed horse racing game is coming to the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Derby Time Online

results.deck: The Gran Turismo numbering conventions get even harder to follow with this Spec III update to GT5P, which will be released on Blu-Ray in Japan.
results.name: Gran Turismo 5 Prologue Spec III

results.deck: A sound novel game developed by Chun Soft originally released for the Wii and then ported to the PSP and PS3
results.name: 428: In the Blocked City, Shibuya

results.deck: MLB Front Office Manager allows the player to step into the shoes of a major league baseball general manager and take control of a baseball franchise.  The goal is to develop a perennial contender by scouting the minors, trading with other teams and even bid on players from Japan.
results.name: MLB Front Office Manager

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 6 Empires is a stand-alone expansion to Dynasty Warriors 6.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 6: Empires

results.deck: 49 Sega classics packed into one huge compilation for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 and includes a variety of bonus material perfect for the biggest of Sega fans.
results.name: Sonic's Ultimate Genesis Collection

results.deck: A visual novel by Nitroplus and 5pb for the PC. It was later ported to the Xbox 360, PSP, and iOS devices. It's about a shut-in high school student that gets involved in a murder case and must cope with that and the errant delusions he faces.
results.name: Ch√§os;HEAd

results.deck: Eye-Create is a video editing 'game' released for use with the Playstation eye. It allows you to take pictures, record and edit videos, record sounds, and includes a large variety of visual effects. More visual effects and games (similar to EyeToy) are available as DLC.
results.name: Eye-Create

results.deck: A new Dynasty Warriors game for the 360, PS3, and PSP. It features four-player co-op and a new questing system.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Strikeforce

results.deck: Return as Alex, Marty, Melman and Gloria as they crash and they make themselves at home in Africa in Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
results.name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa

results.deck: EA Sports' first tennis game slams into action on the Wii with a family-friendly art style and MotionPlus support.
results.name: Grand Slam Tennis

results.deck: A gruesome fairytale slice 'em up with blood and bunny carcasses.
results.name: Fairytale Fights

results.deck: The sequel to the Karoke Revolution Presents: American Idol. Konami and Blitz Games' Karaoke Revolution Presents: American Idol Encore 2! features a new co-op head to head mode and 40 new hit songs from the 70s on.
results.name: Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol Encore 2

results.deck: A hack and slash action game based on the 2010 film of the same name.
results.name: Clash of the Titans

results.deck: MLB 2K9 is the 2009 edition of 2K Sports' MLB 2K series.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K9

results.deck: NPPL Championship Paintball 2009 is paintball game published by Activision. It was the first paintball game released for the current generation of consoles.
results.name: NPPL Championship Paintball 2009

results.deck: Attempt to win trophies by catching various fish.
results.name: Rapala Fishing Frenzy 2009

results.deck: DIRT 2 is part of the long-running rally-racing-series from Codemasters.
results.name: DiRT 2

results.deck: Terminator Salvation is a cover-based third-person shooter that focuses on events leading up to the film by the same name.
results.name: Terminator Salvation

results.deck: As the third installment in the Way of the Samurai franchise, you play as a Ronin wandering through feudal Japan.  Tweaks to the gameplay include a new time mechanic, increased number of swords to collect, and a new companion system.
results.name: Way of the Samurai 3

results.deck: Following the Rock Band formula, The Beatles: Rock Band immerses players into the shoes of the Fab Four as they progress through their career, featuring an exclusively Beatles theme and song list.
results.name: The Beatles: Rock Band

results.deck: The Witcher: Rise of the White Wolf was an enhanced and expanded port of the 2007 PC only game The Witcher. Developed by Widescreen Games, the game was to have a new engine and a wealth of other differences. It has since been cancelled.
results.name: The Witcher: Rise of the White Wolf

results.deck: Movie tie-in based upon the film which was released on March 24th, 2009.
results.name: Monsters vs. Aliens

results.deck: The fifth game in the core Guitar Hero franchise, and the third in the series from Activision and Neversoft.  Though the game goes by the Guitar Hero moniker, it features full-band gameplay like its predecessor, Guitar Hero World Tour.
results.name: Guitar Hero 5

results.deck: The tenth game in the Tony Hawk series, RIDE featured the use of a newly conceived skateboard peripheral in an attempt, by Activision, to reboot the series.
results.name: Tony Hawk: RIDE

results.deck: The sequel to 2007‚Äôs wildly successful first-person-shooter Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 continues the story of American and British soldiers fighting Russian ultra-nationalist forces.
results.name: Modern Warfare 2

results.deck: X-Men Origins: Wolverine is a game based upon the movie of the same name that tells the early story of Wolverine.
results.name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

results.deck: TNA iMPACT! 2 was a video game under development at Midway's Los Angeles studio anticipated for release in 2010. When the company was split up and sold, the license went to SouthPeak and the studio going to THQ, the work done on this game might never be seen.
results.name: TNA iMPACT! 2

results.deck: An open-world crime game, developed by Edge of Reality, that would have starred Snoop Dogg as a thug living in South Central L.A. The game was cancelled on March 1, 2006.
results.name: Fear & Respect

results.deck: MotorStorm is a high-octane arcade racer that pits multiple vehicle classes against each other on treacherous off-road tracks. Different pathways cater to each vehicle's strengths and weaknesses.
results.name: MotorStorm

results.deck: Traverse the nine circles of hell in EA's God of War clone named after the first cycle of Dante Alighieri's epic poem The Divine Comedy.
results.name: Dante's Inferno

results.deck: Under Pressure is a third-person action adventure set on a sunken ship, where a plague has transformed most of the crew and passangers into zombies. The game is being developed by 8 people.
results.name: Under Pressure

results.deck: Return to The Show with Sony's latest and greatest entry in its long-running baseball series. Nothing gets you closer.
results.name: MLB 09: The Show

results.deck: Ride to Hell is a motorcycle gang-land action game that follows Jake Conway and his path of revenge against the brutal biker gang called "the Devil's Hand". Infamously, it is the second game ever to get a 1.0 from GameSpot, after only the truly broken Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing.
results.name: Ride to Hell: Retribution

results.deck: A post-apocalyptic first-person shooter by Recoil Games. Put on "indefinite hold" in 2009, the game reappeared in 2012, with 3D Realms crowd-funding its development.
results.name: Earth No More

results.deck: They is a unique First Person Shooter where cyborgs, aliens and terrorists have consumed modern day England, and it's up to the player to discover why they came. Development of the game is currently halted.
results.name: They

results.deck: A flight combat sim that was under development at Juice Games for PC, PS3, and Xbox 360. It was canceled due to financial troubles at would-be publisher THQ.
results.name: Stormbirds

results.deck: Harker is a canceled vampire-hunting action-adventure game that was announced in 2006. It was being developed by The Collective, which then became Double Helix Games before development was terminated.
results.name: Harker

results.deck: Tears To Tiara is an adult eroge game with tactical role playing gameplay developed by Leaf. The story borrows heavily from Roman, Welsh, Celt and Christian mythology.
results.name: Tears to Tiara

results.deck: One of the goriest fighting game franchises returns to its roots, introducing a new story that re-tells the events of the first three Mortal Kombat games (with a unique twist).
results.name: Mortal Kombat

results.deck: A unique cel-shaded first person action game that runs on the CryEngine 2
results.name: Drug Wars

results.deck: An anthology of the Warriors Orochi games, ported to the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Warriors Orochi Z

results.deck: The miniature ninja Hiro and friends embark on a quest to defeat the Evil Samurai Warlord and his equally evil army in this quirky action/adventure from IO Interactive.
results.name: Mini Ninjas

results.deck: Join Ray McCall and his brother Thomas on a quest for gold, lust, and greed.
results.name: Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood

results.deck: Cancelled open world game that takes place in a fantasy universe
results.name: AionGuard

results.deck: Dead Rising 2 is a third-person action-adventure survival horror game that takes place five years after the end of the original Dead Rising, moving its zombie apocalypse setting into the glamorous Fortune City.
results.name: Dead Rising 2

results.deck: The first Need for Speed game developed by Slightly Mad Studios. "Shift" is an attempt at the simulation sub-genre of racing games, promising a sense of speed with new realistic effects and a new crash mechanic.
results.name: Need for Speed: SHIFT

results.deck: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen is the video game tie-in to the movie of the same name.
results.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen

results.deck: Madden 10 propels us into the next decade with procedural awareness.  Madden 10 introduces a physics based player interaction engine known as Pro-Tak that features gang tackles, improved OL/DL play, and WR/DB interactions.
results.name: Madden NFL 10

results.deck: The Buzz! franchise continues with question specific to the United Kingdom, including bands, cities, sports, television, wildlife, food and more.
results.name: Buzz!: Brain of the UK

results.deck: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 is the second installment in this spin-off Battlefield series. It has a more serious campaign and a vastly expanded multiplayer system.
results.name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2

results.deck: A game based on the 2010 film Iron Man 2. Take control of Iron Man and his new partner War Machine to take down evil with flying suits and superior firepower.
results.name: Iron Man 2

results.deck: Red Dead Redemption is the spiritual successor to 2004's Red Dead Revolver, featuring a vibrant, open world set in the decline of the American Wild West. Players take on the role of former outlaw John Marston, who is forced to hunt down his former gang to regain his family.
results.name: Red Dead Redemption

results.deck: A cancelled sequel to the 2008 Turok reboot by Propaganda Games.
results.name: Turok 2

results.deck: A golf game released as a PlayStation 3 launch title in Japan.
results.name: Miyasato Miyoshi Kyoudai Naizou: SEGA Golf Club

results.deck: The fourth full game in the Dead to Rights franchise is a completely fresh start, ditching all story of past games in favor of a new story direction.
results.name: Dead to Rights: Retribution

results.deck: Virtua Tennis 2009 is the latest iteration of the Virtua Tennis series, featuring an updated roster, new minigames, and several gameplay tweaks.
results.name: Virtua Tennis 2009

results.deck: Cruz del Sur is the second expansion for the nautical MMO Uncharted Waters Online.
results.name: Uncharted Water Online: Cruz del Sur

results.deck: G.I. Joe: The Game picks up where the recent film, G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra, left off, although it takes liberties with the film's plot and incorporates elements of the comics and television series.
results.name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra

results.deck: In this German action-RPG, Scarlett, the daughter of Death itself, sets out to rescue her ghoulish father from an evil Necromancer who threatens to destroy the world.
results.name: Venetica

results.deck: Tide of Iron is based on the tabletop wargame of the same name, developed by Fantasy Flight Games
results.name: Tide of Iron

results.deck: A prequel to Dead Space, Extraction tells the story of the original Necromorph outbreak on the USG Ishimura. The game trades the original's third-person action for a hectic on-rails shooter from a first-person perspective.
results.name: Dead Space Extraction

results.deck: Alice is back, and so is her fragile grasp on reality. She must journey through both Victorian London and the dark world of Wonderland to retain her sanity and find out the truth behind her family's deaths, in this long-awaited sequel to American McGee's Alice.
results.name: Alice: Madness Returns

results.deck: A fourth iteration in the SingStar franchise for PlayStation 3, the first to be packaged with wireless microphones and feature voice-activated menus.
results.name: SingStar Pop Edition

results.deck: In the follow-up to Lost Planet, players explore new environments as they see the story through the perspective of different groups of pirates trying to survive on E.D.N. III.
results.name: Lost Planet 2

results.deck: A cancelled game based on the Flash comic series.
results.name: The Flash

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 is the latest edition of the perennial golf series, brought to you by EA Sports and EA Tiburon. The Wii version can be played with the Motion Plus adapter, while the 360 and PS3 versions utilize analog sticks for club control.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10

results.deck: Dead Space 2 is the sequel to the 2008 surprise hit Dead Space. The no-longer-silent Isaac Clarke finds himself trapped on a city-sized space station called the Sprawl, which has been overtaken by another Necromorph infestation.
results.name: Dead Space 2

results.deck: The sequel to the open world driving game, Test Drive Unlimited.
results.name: Test Drive Unlimited 2

results.deck: An underwater exploration game where players control a journalist searching for a missing oceanographer in Kisira Atoll, Polynesia.
results.name: Aquanaut's Holiday: Hidden Memories

results.deck: A hostess-club/dating simulator from D3 Publisher Inc.
results.name: Dream C Club

results.deck: The sequel to the BIGS aims to further refine the arcade feel of the original.
results.name: The BIGS 2

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is a compilation of some of the most popular songs from previous titles. This time, all songs are master recordings, and there is full band support for each track.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits

results.deck: Split/Second is an arcade racing game by developer Black Rock Studio. The game takes place in a made-for-TV city designed for destruction.
results.name: Split/Second

results.deck: The third band-specific Guitar Hero offering from Activision, Guitar Hero: Van Halen allows you to play as the rock legends themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Van Halen

results.deck: Formerly known as the NCAA March Madness Series, NCAA Basketball 09 is the exclusive NCAA Basketball game by EA Sports.  It serves as the only up-to-date college basketball simulation on the market.  Cover athlete is Kevin Love of the UCLA Bruins.
results.name: NCAA Basketball 09

results.deck: A Superman game that was being developed by Rogue Squadron creator Factor 5, until the developer shut down in 2009.
results.name: Factor 5's Superman Project

results.deck: Salem and Rios return with a new adventure set in Shanghai called Army of Two: The 40th Day.
results.name: Army of Two: The 40th Day

results.deck: Vancouver 2010 is the official videogame of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
results.name: Vancouver 2010

results.deck: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 is a PS3-exclusive enhanced port of Ninja Gaiden II, which was released for the Xbox 360 in 2008. It is the sequel to the first Ninja Gaiden Sigma, which too was an enhanced version of the original Ninja Gaiden for Xbox.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2

results.deck: This year is the 30th anniversary of Gundam. To celebrate there will be a new PS3 game.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battlefield Record U.C.0081

results.deck: NCAA Football 10 is the 13th game in the EA's NCAA Football series. This edition of the heralded college football simulator has added a few new features to the series, such as player lock on offense and defense, higher camera angles, and a create-a-school feature.
results.name: NCAA Football 10

results.deck: A vertical arcade shooter.
results.name: Mamorukun Curse!

results.deck: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock is a standalone game that packages up 20 classic rock songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from The Who, Rush, Boston and The Police, among others.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock

results.deck: R.U.S.E. is an RTS developed and published by Ubisoft with "ruses" and deception as a central game concept.
results.name: R.U.S.E.

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name, G-Force follows a team of guinea pigs who have secret lives as spies....IN 3-D!!!
results.name: G-Force

results.deck: Katamari Forever is the first game in the quirky Katamari Damacy series for the PS3. It's a combination of old and new levels in high definition with all-new music.
results.name: Katamari Forever

results.deck: The latest installment in the storied franchise, A Crack In Time marks the end of the "Future" trilogy.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank Future: A Crack in Time

results.deck: Plants Vs. Zombies is an action-strategy tower defense-style game developed by PopCap that tasks the player with surviving an onslaught of the undead by growing plants on their lawn.
results.name: Plants vs. Zombies

results.deck: Game based on the animated film version of the classic children's tale written by Judi Barrett.
results.name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs

results.deck: After turning their infamy into worldwide fame, the Third Street Saints now find themselves at war with a powerful criminal organization called The Syndicate. Strap it on.
results.name: Saints Row: The Third
